titles.title: Alex Diekmann Peak Designation Act of 2016
To designate Alex Diekmann Peak in Montana.
Alex Diekmann Peak Designation Act of 2016

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary:
Alex Diekmann Peak Designation Act of 2016
This bill designates as the Alex Diekmann Peak the 9,765-foot peak located 2.2 miles west-northwest of Finger Mountain on the western boundary of the Lee Metcalf Wilderness in Montana.
